name: FavourUp
slogan: FavourUp Extends Impact of Influencer Endorsements for Retail Brands
description:
A web platform that allows brands to quickly aggregate their influencer generated content from social media, and showcase it on their e-commerce platform for consumers to see when shopping. In this way, customers see way more engaging content, and of course they buy more.

The key differentiator of FavourUp's Endorsed Content Engine is that it can sort content according to local trending topics of where the viewer is.

team.title: CMO & Co-founder
team.name: Veronica Chang
team.bioHtml: CMO @FavourUp A creative who love listening and laughing. Born marketer in fashion, specialising in influencer marketing and turning leads to paying customers.

team.title: CEO & Co-founder
team.name: Andre Wang
team.bioHtml: CEO of FavourUp. Winner of Google Developer Scholarship 17/18. Experienced full-stack developer & UX/UI designer with 7 yrs+ experience.

jobs.title: Business Development Associate (Fixed-term Contract)
jobs.description:
*£25,000-£30,000 basic (OTE uncapped) first year.*
Life is short. I know you have no time to waste on reading boring job descriptions and want to focus on delivering ASAP. So I’m going to make the summary short and we will chat in detail later.

About FavourUp
FavourUp is a web platform that extends the impact of influencer endorsements for retail brands, mainly in fashion. We have a vision to create a world where people will never buy a product they regret, while saving their time in searching for the right items.
We are a crowdfunding backed startup based in Farringdon, currently with a small team of 4. Yes, the two young and energetic co-founders, Andre and Veronica, plus two lovely and smart developer colleagues. We specialise in utilising Location-based Datato power Endorsed Content.
You will be the very first Business Dev Associate joining the team. So you will make a real impact on the company’s future.

The Role
The role starts with an one-month contact, which would be turned into a longer contract or a full-time role if the targets are hit.

It is important that you speak English at an idiomatic level.

You will be selling everyday and confident about it, both over the phone and through emails. We’re based in a co-working space. You can’t be shy of making noise when talking to customers. You are an ambitious and caring achiever who is always working hard to meet the targets, using the right tools. Customers love you because you are always helpful. I know you care about the company culture. Don’t worry! We will build the culture together with you and make sure you love it.

Looks like it’s something for you? Get in touch now with a quick brief why you are interested in this position and why you believe you are the right person for this job. We won’t bite!

jobs.title: Software Dev Intern
jobs.description:
#InfluencerMarketing #MachineLearning #LocationData #SocialMedia #Startup

FavourUp is a Crowdfunding backed startup based in Clerkenwell, pioneering the use of User-generated Content. We build a Geo-targeting Advocacy Platform to help fashion, retrail, and travel brands to create endless location-driven user-generated content, and provide real-time insights down to a postcode level.

Despite current focus on the fashion industry, FavourUp is on a mission to bridging the gap between today’s retail brands and tomorrow’s technologies.

FavourUp is backed by industry-leading luxury retailer, Farfetch, and over 200 crowd investros on Crowdcube.

Alright! Enough about us. Now it’s about you!

You will turn our UX/UI design into code.
You will be heavily involved in our product development.
You will learn our product form top to bottom.
You will learn our lean philosophy.

Our stack: LEMP (Laravel, NginX, MySQL, PHP), VueJS, Javascript (ES6), jQuery, Git, HTML, CSS3.

It is important that you speak English at an idiomatic level. Students on a computer science related subject is desirable. But surely we are open on it. Don’t be shy to reach out if you have got something to show us.

Please kindly note that there is no budgets invovled in the role. Working hours are flexible depending on your curriculum.

No agencies pleases.

jobs.title: Digital Content Intern (PR)
jobs.description:
#InfluencerMarketing #MachineLearning #LocationData #SocialMedia #Startup

FavourUp is a Crowdfunding backed startup based in Clerkenwell, pioneering the use of Endorsed Content and Machine Learning to help end customers locate the best fashion items they are looking for.

Despite current focus on the fashion industry, FavourUp is on a mission to provide smarter and more effective product recommendation beyond fashion; bridging the gap between today’s retail brands and tomorrow’s technologies; creating a world where people will never buy a product they regret.

We’re a youngish team of 4, specialising in Influencer Marketing, Machine Learning, and Location-based data. The first product of FavourUp, Endorsed Content Engine is a SaaS platform that helps fashion brands quickly aggregate influencer generated content and showcase it on their e-commerce platforms for consumers to see when shopping. Our current clients are mainly fashion-week-attending brands.

Alright! Enough about us. Now it’s about you!

In short, we need you to get FavourUp’s name out there. You will take care of our social media account and content. You have to enjoy learning and initiating.

Tasks include writing weekly blog and Linkedin posts, reaching out influencers, producing press releases, and building relationships with journalists, and tracking performance of your work. Sometimes it may go beyond the scope due to the dynamic environment, but I’m sure you will love it.

Native English speaker is a must. Students on a journalism/communication related subject is desirable. But surely we are open on it. Don’t be shy to reach out if you have got something to show us.

Please kindly note that there is no budget in this intern role currently. In return:

You will learn more about how a startup works.
You will learn more about the fashion-tech industry.
You will learn more about how PR and influencer marketing work in fashion.

Working days are flexible depending on your curriculum. (For example, we can see you every Monday.)

No agencies pleases.
